nodes.text: A repulsorlift chair, also called repulsor-chair, or hoverchair, was a one-being, repulsorlift-powered floating chair. After losing his right leg during a violent encounter with Sand People, Cliegg Lars was forced to use one such device. Agruss, an overweight Zygerrian slavemaster, also used a repulsor-chair. The Siniteen Golas Aram used a hoverchair on Irudiru shortly before the liberation of Kashyyyk.
